OVM diagram
```{r}

ovm <- tribble(
  ~stage, ~depth, ~probability,
  "preflexion", 0, 60,
  "preflexion", 25, 20,
  "preflexion", 50, 10,
  "preflexion", 75, 10,
  "flexion", 0, 30,
  "flexion", 25, 30,
  "flexion", 50, 30,
  "flexion", 75, 10,
  "postflexion", 0, 10,
  "postflexion", 25, 20,
  "postflexion", 50, 40,
  "postflexion", 75, 30
)

ovm$stage <- factor(ovm$stage, levels=c("preflexion","flexion","postflexion"))
ggplot(ovm, aes(x="", y=probability, fill=factor(depth))) + geom_col(width=1) + coord_polar(theta="y") + facet_wrap(~stage) + theme_classic() + scale_fill_discrete(labels = c("0-25", "25-50", "50-75", "75-100"), name="Depth (m)") + labs(x="", y="Probability")
ggsave("../../figs/ovm-example.png")

```
